Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization for the county of Schoharie to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property
Summary: Extends the authorization for the county of Schoharie to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property.
ActClause: AN ACT amend chapter 333 of the laws of 2006 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Schoharie to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
